title: Combined oxidation and in situ coagulation in an iron-activated sulfite process for tribromophenol removal in an actual water matrix
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00368C, Paper
Fan Bai, Zongping Wang, Guodong Wan, Lisan Cao, Yujie Cheng, Zhenbin Chen, Pengchao Xie
This study demonstrates that Fe(III)/S(IV) pre-oxidation and in situ coagulation exhibit a synergistic effect, with in situ generated Fe(III) showing superior performance compared to pre-formed Fe(III) during the pre-oxidation process.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
